info.title: vibe80 REST API
info.description: Spec (workspace auth, providers at workspace level)

post.summary: Clear messages for provider or worktree

get.summary: Get RPC logs for session (debug only)

post.summary: Rename or move a file or folder inside a worktree
Delete a file or folder inside a worktree

BrowsePath.name: path
BrowsePath.description: Relative path to browse (defaults to root).

MessagesLimit.name: limit
MessagesLimit.description: Max number of messages to return (default 50).

BeforeMessageId.name: beforeMessageId
BeforeMessageId.description: Return messages before this message id (exclusive).
